𓌉 𓌃 𓎗 𓎘 𓇅 𓇇

𓋴 𓐍 𓂋 𓏏 𓍼 𓏤 | roll (of papyrus) | scrit
𓂧 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓇇||papyrus plant|cherid™ > scrit schrift ⇔ write 𓏟
𓂧 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓇇||papyrus plant|cherid™ > reed 𓇅 3

write ≈ 𓇅 𓌉 white >
letter waw 𓎘 𓎗 Y 𐩠 𐤅 ו 𐡅 V 𐩺 ᵛyodh vs P ᚹ ƿ vs 𓏲 ﻭ ܘ 𐩥 vs qoph 𓎗 𐩤 𑀯 waw 𐩺 የ y j

𓎗 (scr)weavt reef(t) writ 𓎗 white #wD word ⇔ T4 𓌉 , V25 𓎘 script (w)rith:rise/rein ⇔ mwød 𓌃

𒋻 decret/decision/disease/deduct/cut
𒋻 scrit/scratch/street/sekt:cut/sekret/incise ⇔ sgraphie
𒋻 tear/tar/Teer
𒁲 tie, compare, compete, equal
